metadata.synopsis: One liner for when players steal something from the offering chests in Stormshore Tabernacle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Steal something from the offering chests with the temple guardan close enough.CTY_Main_A aprox 107; 45; -22

0.speaker: Vicar Humbletoes
0.text: Again you commit blasphemous theft in this holy tabernacle? Have you learned nothing?

1.speaker: Vicar Humbletoes
1.text: You thought it wise to steal from the gods? A curse be upon you!
